definition: double-edged sword/CL:口[kou3],把[ba3]/classifier for blows of a sword
various genera of flowers of Asteracea family (daisies and chrysanthemums), including Atractylis lancea

sentences.english: Chinese boxing, Fencing, A variety of instruments.
sentences.chinese: 中国拳术，剑术，各种器械。

sentences.english: It also borrows footwork found in fencing and techniques from Western classical boxing.
sentences.chinese: 它还借用了剑术的步法和西方传统拳击技巧。

sentences.english: We hear that Your Highness is an expert swordsman.
I also learned swordplay at Wu Dang Mountain When I was only ten years old.
sentences.chinese: 我还在武当山学过剑术，那时我才十岁。

sentences.english: Hamlet and Laertes were known to excel at this sword play.
sentences.chinese: 哈姆莱特和雷欧提斯两个人都精通剑术。

sentences.english: As its name implies, "sword rule" is the practicing way of swordsmanship.
sentences.chinese: 顾名词义，“剑法”就是剑术的方法。

sentences.english: He had not even begun to learn the art to which he had devoted his life.
sentences.chinese: 将自己的一生献给了剑术，却未曾开始学习。

sentences.english: Third, the swordplay learning must emphasize faith and reverence to the gods, therefore the learners can ascent from technique level to Taoism.
sentences.chinese: 第三，学习剑术须重视信仰，敬畏神明，由术入道。

sentences.english: The servant was disappointed. He knew nothing about fighting with swords.
sentences.chinese: 仆人很懊恼，因为他对剑术格斗一无所知。

sentences.english: The video of the sparring practice conducted in the Introductory Swordsmanship Course.
sentences.chinese: 基础剑术训练课程中的对打练习。

sentences.english: Years ago, he was once confident about his swordsmanship.
sentences.chinese: 几年前，他曾经对自己的剑术自信。

sentences.english: Some suggestions are offered to apply this method to the teaching of other carte and tierce repertoire extensively.
sentences.chinese: 综合教学法也适用于其它剑术套路的教学。

sentences.english: Bards can now gain the Blade Master discipline.
sentences.chinese: 吟游诗人现在得到剑术掌握了。

definition: Wugong County in Xianyang 咸陽|咸阳[Xian2 yang2], Shaanxi
martial art/military accomplishments/(Peking opera) martial arts feats
pose or motion of one's body in martial arts
double-edged sword/CL:口[kou3],把[ba3]/classifier for blows of a sword
a kind of traditional Chinese sword-play
